list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large number or amount; a great deal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there are a lot of actors in the cast
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có rất nhiều diễn viên trong diễn viên

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he played tennis a lot last year
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ấy chơi tennis rất nhiều năm ngoái

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a particular group, collection, or set of people or things.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it's just one lot of rich people stealing from another
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nó chỉ là một số người giàu ăn cắp từ người khác

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an article or set of articles for sale at an auction.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mười chín lô không bán được

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: one of a set of objects such as straws, stones, or pieces of paper that are randomly selected as part of a decision-making process.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they drew lots to determine the order in which they asked questions
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đã vẽ rất nhiều để xác định thứ tự mà họ đặt câu hỏi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person's luck or condition in life, particularly as determined by fate or destiny.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: plans to improve the lot of the disadvantaged
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: kế hoạch để cải thiện rất nhiều thiệt thòi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: divide (items) into lots for sale at an auction.
